channel.title: Picking Up Items
channel.description: Hello guys, what it is, I am using Devolution source and I was wondering how I would go about making it so if playerIsMember is set to 0 then it won't allow that player to pick up a certain item from the ground, help me please, I have been trying for two days now, thank you so much.
